subject: Opening of site offices
text: HTdl4 75q <TTHT gifaarut PHONE 91-11-5074100/5074200 (73c 4ar7 & TrTAN TATT4) Fax 91-11-5093507/5093514 Extn; 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) (.5 & 6, SECTOA-10; DWARKA NEW DELHI-11O045 No.11041/21/2002-Admn.III October 22, 2002 POLICY MATTERS ADMNISTRATIONIFINANCE (2212002)) (Decision taken on Administration Division's File No.11041/12/2002-Admn.III) QPENNG QF SITE QFFICES It has been observed that Site Offices are being opened by the Technical Divisions without informing Administration Division, which is causing administrative inconvenience in providing manpower support, logistics and giving transfer grants to the officers. 2_ It has now been decided that all the proposals for opening of Site Offices would be routed through Administration Division and the office order for opening Site Offices would be issued by Administration Division only: 3 76+, U> L? wi th tbo alpoPial % Chaiera 5 Sqounallkov (S. Loganathan) General Manager (Admn.) To: AlI CGMs AII GMs at Headquarters #IJ e} PlUs/ cMUs to: PS to Chairman AII Members PDs Copy
